com.mypurecloud.sdk.v2.model.DirectRouting

    Package Description
    com.mypurecloud.sdk.v2.model  

    • Uses of DirectRouting in com.mypurecloud.sdk.v2.model

      Methods in com.mypurecloud.sdk.v2.model that return DirectRouting 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DirectRouting DirectRouting.agentWaitSeconds(Integer agentWaitSeconds)
      Time (in seconds) that a Direct Routing interaction will wait for Direct Routing agent before going to selected backup.
      DirectRouting DirectRouting.backupQueueId(String backupQueueId)
      ID of queue to be used as the default backup if an agent does not have their Backup Settings configured.
      DirectRouting DirectRouting.callMediaSettings(DirectRoutingCallMediaSettings callMediaSettings)
      Direct Routing Settings specific to Call media.
      DirectRouting DirectRouting.emailMediaSettings(DirectRoutingMediaSettings emailMediaSettings)
      Direct Routing Settings specific to Email media.
      DirectRouting UserQueue.getDirectRouting() 
      DirectRouting QueueRequest.getDirectRouting() 
      DirectRouting Queue.getDirectRouting() 
      DirectRouting CreateQueueRequest.getDirectRouting() 
      DirectRouting DirectRouting.messageMediaSettings(DirectRoutingMediaSettings messageMediaSettings)
      Direct Routing Settings specific to Message media.
      DirectRouting DirectRouting.waitForAgent(Boolean waitForAgent)
      Flag indicating if Direct Routing interactions should wait for Direct Routing agent or go immediately to selected backup.
